scripts.build: tsc && cp -R -f data out && cp -R -f html out
scripts.deploy: yarn build && cp -R -f out deploy && cp run.sh deploy && cp yarn.lock deploy && cp package.json deploy
scripts.build-win: tsc && xcopy data out\data /s /i /y && xcopy html out\html /s /i /y
scripts.deploy-win: yarn build-win && xcopy out deploy /s /i /y && xcopy run.sh deploy /y && xcopy yarn.lock deploy /y && xcopy package.json deploy /y
